t: Todd Snider - East Nashville Skyline - Amazon.com Music
s: So happy that Todd's reissuing his classics on vinyl. Went to his show last month (which was fantastic) and was pleasantly surprised to see this one and Songs from the daily planet on the merch table. Was flying and didn't want to lug records around so I ordered it on Amazon and it was waiting for me when I got home! ... Great cd arrived on time in good condition. ... Todd Snider ...

t: Todd Snider - Peace Queer - Amazon.com Music
s: Awesome Todd Snider, I have been listening to Todd since about day one, and have seen him in concert a few times, i love his music, but on occasion have been disappointed a little in his published efforts, not this on though, I must have listened to it 10 times in a row before I moved on.

t: Return Of The Storyteller: CDs & Vinyl - Todd Snider
s: The vinyl print is solid as I find most folk music to convert well regardless of print quality. This album has all the new story’s from the storyteller. My favorite was a new one about being Outdoors. It killed me in 2021 at the concert I saw and again today when I was finally able to hear an evolved version of the story again. Record includes a lot of Todd Snider ...

Todd Snider, R.S. Field - New Connection - Amazon.com Music
s: Speaking of tugging heartstrings, Waco Moon will do that to you - quite the ode to a friend who's gone. A lot of the reason I listen to Todd Snider's music is cause he makes me smile (and sometimes grin), like in Vinyl Records (I've got about a quarter of it memorized and I've listened to it ...

t: Todd Snider - Excitement Plan - Amazon.com Music
s: Truly one of the best Todd has ever done ... Yes they steal your heart than your lawnmower. ... Für mich ist diese CD seine drittbeste - nach den beiden ersten. Interessant ist immer, was Snider veröffentlicht, nicht alles gefälltt jedem, der er experimentiert durchaus auch recht fleißig ...

t: SNIDER,TODD - Songs For The Daily Planet - Amazon.com Music
s: From the opening track 'My Generation ... the music industry hype around the Seattle music scene, Snider's songwriting and performing chops shine on his incredible debut. In a gatefold sleeve, on translucent green vinyl, the first time ever released on vinyl!...

t: Todd Snider - The Excitement Plan - Amazon.com Music
s: Street corner prophet and good time buddy, Todd Snider, has been championing the overlooked and underappreciated for over fifteen years. This year he's back with The Excitement Plan, an album the combines social commentary, gypsy recession recovery plan and soul-folk in to one unified masterpiece.
